rules_text:
First mate – Your starting deck contains “The [i]Ashen Cross[/i]” and each nonland, nonlegendary permanent card in your starting deck has a triggered ability. [i](If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)[/i]
Whenever Olavan crews a Vehicle, that Vehicle gains deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn.
